name: Redon Solutions
tagline: Enhancing your visual identity by buildin function
description:
Established in 2004, Redon Solutions Pvt Ltd (www.ecreeds.com) is a proven, Global Internet consulting and development agency helping clients to create and implement full-service digital business solutions. 
Combining diverse expertise in business strategy, technology, usability and design, Redon produces highly scalable business solutions and online user experiences. 
Redon has provided custom solutions for a diverse array of industries, including Retail, financial and insurance, marketing, Real Estate, Healthcare, Travel, among others. This extensive background demonstrates our understanding of business principles that apply across industries, as well as the ability and initiative to understand problems and solutions that apply to specific companies. 
From the interface design and creative aspects of the front end, to the application development and integrated functional components of the back end, Redon is able to provide a total solution for the strategic planning, development, launch, and support of any web-related business initiative. 
We leverage W3C standards, open source Web Application and other proprietary technologies to deliver rich applications to your customers, employees, and partners over the web, intranets and extranets.
